author: Legacy Engram
text: An engram with remarkable but familiar markers. A Cryptarch would be pleased to decode it.

author: The Armamentarium
text: For This, There Is One Remedy

author: Sealed Ahamkara Grasps
text: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations...oh bearer mine.

author: Voidfang Vestments
text: YOU WILL DREAM OF TEETH AND NOTHING ELSE

author: MIDA Multi-Tool
text: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.
